T02D3119:219a-0: @219a ` // so sor 'brang ma'i sgrub thabs bzhugs /
T02D3119:219a-2: # // so sor 'brang ma chen mo la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3119:219a-3: sngar bstan ba'i cho gas stong ba nyid bsgoms pa'i rdzas la /
T02D3119:219a-4: aa las skyes pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du yi
T02D3119:219a-5: ge pram ser po 'od zer sna tshogs las sems
T02D3119:219a-6: can gyi don byed pa ste /
T02D3119:219a-7: de yongs su gyur pa las skad cig gis bcom
T02D3119:219a-8: ldan 'das ma chen mo so sor 'brang mar bdag
T02D3119:219a-10: / mdog ser mo zhal bzhi pa spyan gsum pa /
T02D3119:219a-12: zhal dang po ser po dang /
T02D3119:219a-16: g-yas kyi phyag rnams kyis ral gri dang /
T02D3119:219a-20: g-yon gyi phyag rnams kyis gzhu dang /
T02D3119:219a-24: sna tshogs padma zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi gdan la rol pas bzhugs pa /
T02D3119:219a-26: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T02D3119:219a-27: gos sna tshogs kyi na bza' bsnams pa /
T02D3119:219a-29: rin po che sna tshogs kyi dbu rgyan can /
T02D3119:219a-31: sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la /
T02D3119:219a-32: aom a'a: h'um dkar po dang /
T02D3119:219a-34: sngon po'i yi ge gsum bsam par bya'o //
T02D3119:219a-35: de nas nu ma'i dbus su zla ba la gnas pa'i yi ge pram bsams nas /
T02D3119:219a-36: sna tshogs pa'i lha mo rnams kyis bdag nyid mchod par bsam sa te /
T02D3119:219a-37: ji srid du ngal bar ma gyur ba de srid du spro bas bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3119:219a-38: ngal bar gyur na rang gi snying ga'i zla ba
T02D3119:219a-39: la sngags mu tig gi phreng ba'i tshul du bzlas
T02D3119:219b-0: par bya'o // aom na ni dha ri @219b badzra
T02D3119:219b-1: ma h'a pra ti s'a re h'um h'um phat phat
T02D3119:219b-2: par bya'o // sv'a h'a / zhes ba ni sngags so //
